article.Heading: GST meet underway: Rate fitment committee proposes 62 items to continue in 28% bracket
article.Summary: All eyes are on the GST Council meet that is underway in Guwahati today. CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan learns from sources that the rate fitment committee proposes only 62 items to continue in 28 percent bracket.
article.Body:
All eyes are on the GST Council meet that is underway in Guwahati today. CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan learns from sources that the rate fitment committee proposes only 62 items to continue in 28 percent bracket.

Also watch experts react to the news development.

Watch videos for more...
